children.subject: They will be optionally group work, so if you would feel more comfortable working by yourself that's fine too!
Hi Wei, yes the application on the decal website is the same, so you should be good to go!

Hi Lily,

I signed up a couple of days ago using the link on decal.berkeley.edu since I saw the application link on there. It’s the same application correct? So if I already filled it out that means I applied right?

history.content:
Hey all, Web Design DeCal enrollment applications are open!

You know you’re going to spend the Fall semester surfing the internet — why not spend some of this time learning how to make beautifully designed websites too? Come take the Web Design DeCal and learn to design and code a website from scratch!

Learn more at wdd.io and check out some awesome projects from past students at webdesigndecal.github.io/showcase.

This 2-unit course will be held on Tuesdays 7:00 – 8:30 PM and Thursdays 7:00 – 8:00 PM PDT online (Zoom).

Apply at wdd.io/go/apply by Friday, August 27th, 2021 11:59 PM (PST). This class is designed for beginners and all majors, no prior coding experience necessary. Hope to see you in class!

If you’d like to audit, there is no need to apply. We’ll post recorded lectures on YouTube and you’ll have access to course materials.
history.subject: Web Design DeCal Fa21 Enrollment Applications Released!
